record.field: Enviar email novo post aos seguidores do tema

if object.website_published and object.category_id: partners = env['res.partner'].search( [('post_category_ids', 'in', object.category_id.id)]) template = env['email.template'].browse(23)
for partner in partners: tmpl = template.with_context({'partner_email': partner.email, 'partner_name': partner.name}) tmpl.send_mail(object.id)

template = env['email.template'].browse(24) for partner in object.forum_id.message_follower_ids: tmpl = template.with_context({'partner_email': partner.email, 'partner_name': partner.name}) tmpl.send_mail(object.id)
